trends: There have been 73 other sightings in Salt Lake City
There were no other sightings in Salt Lake City on or around November 14th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsWhile driving East bound on I-80 in eastern Salt Lake City I saw what I at first believed was a star. After observing it hanging in place for a few seconds the golden light began moving at an increasing rate. It picked up speed rapidly and disappeared leaving a streak of light. It was similar to a shooting star except that it was a golden color and wasn't moving for the initial few seconds of observation and the light pollution in the area would have prevented the viewing of shooting stars.
Summary: Glowing Golden star-like orb Hanging in sky and then bolted off
